Text.Page: My colleague, Neria, has misplaced her assistant, Timuron. He went into the cemetery to collect his own samples. Smart lad, and brave. He's overdue though, and I worry he's in over his head. Could you look for him? I'm sure she's worried about the lad.

Esedran sent you? Velik be praised!

I've been testing various compounds on remnants of the dead I could get my hands on. Neria can probably glean more from this than you or I could.

Would you mind taking it to her? I'm going to stay here and see if I can find out anything else.

Thank you for bringing this to me, , but thank you more for letting me know Timuron's all right.

Now, stand backâ€”I'm going to try science.
